description: Returns information about contributor insights for a given table or global secondary index.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table to describe. You can also provide the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table in this parameter.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table being described.

nested_items.name: IndexName
nested_items.description: The name of the global secondary index being described.

nested_items.name: ContributorInsightsRuleList
nested_items.description: List of names of the associated contributor insights rules.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateDateTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp of the last time the status was changed.

nested_items.name: FailureException
nested_items.description: Returns information about the last failure that was encountered.

LimitExceededException - Per-account Amazon CloudWatch Contributor Insights rule limit reached. Please disable Contributor Insights for other tables/indexes OR disable Contributor Insights rules before retrying.
AccessDeniedException - Amazon CloudWatch Contributor Insights rules cannot be modified due to insufficient permissions.
AccessDeniedException - Failed to create service-linked role for Contributor Insights due to insufficient permissions.
InternalServerError - Failed to create Amazon CloudWatch Contributor Insights rules. Please retry request.
